query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.* FROM study_group sg, study_group_class sgc, study st WHERE sgc.study_id=st.study_id AND sg.study_group_class_id = sgc.study_group_class_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT sg.* FROM study_group sg, subject_group_map sgmap WHERE sg.study_group_id=sgmap.study_group_id AND sgmap.study_subject_id = ?

query.name: getGroupByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT sg.* from study_group sg, study_subject ss, subject_group_map sgm where sgm.study_group_id = sg.study_group_id and sgm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id and ss.study_subject_id = ? and (ss.study_id = ? or study_id in (select study_id from study where parent_study_id = ?))

query.name: findSubjectStudyGroup
query.sql: select * from study_group sg, subject_group_map sgm, study_group_class sgc where sgm.study_group_class_id=sgc.study_group_class_id and sgm.study_group_id=sg.study_group_id and sgm.study_subject_id =? and sgc.name=?

query.name: findSubjectGroupMaps
query.sql: SELECT sg.*, sgmap.study_subject_id FROM study_group sg, study_group_class sgc, subject_group_map sgmap WHERE sg.study_group_id=sgmap.study_group_id AND sg.study_group_class_id = sgc.study_group_class_id AND sgc.study_id = ?

query.name: findAllByGroupClass
query.sql: SELECT sg.* FROM study_group sg WHERE sg.study_group_class_id=? ORDER BY study_group_id

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_group SET study_group_class_id=?, name=?, description=? WHERE study_group_id=?

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.* FROM study_group sg, study st WHERE sg.study_group_id=? AND sg.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByNameAndGroupClassId
query.sql: select sg.* from study_group sg where sg.name = ? and sg.study_group_class_id = ?
